https://tmrev.io/movie/486865-Christmas in Mississippi 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8QuTa9ygzYmNiAJcV9W3U6fNMWa.jpg Photographer Holly Logan returns to her hometown of Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. The town is resurrecting their traditional holiday light show for the first time since a terrible hurricane struck five years earlier. Holly volunteers to pitch in, but soon has second thoughts when she discovers the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike. Christmas in Mississippi
